title: The Resurgent Knicks and NFL Playoff Picks With Mike Breen and Peter Schrager
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by broadcaster Mike Breen to talk about an optimistic start to the Knicks season, tales from the broadcast booth, and more (3:30). Then Bill talks with Peter Schrager of Fox Sports and NFL Network about Bill’s NFL Playoff Gambling Manifesto and to preview all the wild-card games, before Bill gives out his Million Dollar NFL Picks (44:00).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
